== PPA ==

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/FAQ#Why_Ubuntu_GNOME_is_not_shipped_with_the_latest_version_of_GNOME.3F | Ubuntu GNOME is not shipped with the latest version of GNOME]]</nowiki>. However, you can use the latest version of GNOME:

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~gnome3-team/+archive/gnome3 | GNOME3 Stable PPA]]</nowiki> - This is the stable version, and contains updates for any packages that didn't make it into the Ubuntu archives for the current stable cycle.

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~gnome3-team/+archive/gnome3-staging | GNOME3 Staging PPA]]</nowiki> - staging is for the things that have known regressions and/or bugs. Basically a place to get the bleeding edge packages that are still a work in progress and under testing.

== Launchpad ==
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-gnome-packaging | Ubuntu GNOME Developers Team]]</nowiki>.

== Note ==
* Security and bugfix updates for Ubuntu GNOME are provided by <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-gnome-dev|Ubuntu GNOME Developers]]</nowiki> and Community.
